articles.title: 9/11, Once a Rare Source of American Unity, Is Now Another Political Battleground - Newsweek
articles.description: "When it comes to the unity of America, those days seem distant from our own," former President George W. Bush lamented in remarks at a 9/11 event on Saturday.
articles.content:
Two decades ago, American unity appeared to reach record highs in the wake of the devastating September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks. Today, 9/11 is a source of substantial political tensions.
